gcci.text: H100 supply improves with normalized lead times, easing capex risk and stabilizing deployment schedules.

gtpi.text: API price wars compress input-token rates as efficiency-focused models intensify competition.

gagl.text: Grid strain from 160 TWh annual AI load accelerates nuclear baseload commitments and grid interconnection upgrades.

aipi.text: Optimistic but cautious sentiment persists as growth outpaces cost discipline, with consolidation signaling bubble risk alongside sustainability concerns.
